name: Shopping Mall Fashion Boutique
description:
Get ready for Shopping Mall Fashion Boutique in beautifully designed realistic fashion store supermarket or free shopping center. In this amazing shopping super mall game, you will be engaged in a realistic shopping mall or colorful fashion boutique as a professional cashier girl of popular shopping mall of USA. As a school girl, you would always have wanted to shadow adult’s real-life activities, what about handling cash on newly advanced cash register as trained fashion store cashier girl or popular fashion cashier manager, while utilizing supermarket simulator or atm machine simulator in a realistic shopping center.


Shopping Mall Fashion Boutique takes you realistic fashion store supermarket or free shopping center of a popular shopping mall or colorful fashion boutique with realistic supermarket or big shopping mall environment. Be a pro fashion store cashier girl or popular fashion cashier manager and handle multiple customers on advanced cash register with supermarket simulator or atm machine simulator having highly optimized payments collecting preferences.

Silent Features:

- Beautifully designed colorful graphics with realistic superstore environment!
- High engaging fashion salon shopping simulation based levels!
- Support for multiple payment acceptance methodologies like cash, credit card or NFC & more!
- Beautifully designed interface for enhancing kids mathematical abilities!
- Highly colorful girls dress up, fashion care or colorful fashion boutique & fashion shop shelves!
- Get instant rewards on successful customer handling with time management simulation!
